name: Unstable Towers
description:
A physics game where patience and self control is key.

Use the Arrow key's to move the crates around (up to slow them down).

Left CTRL and ALT to rotate the crates.

You win when you stack 15 crates!

This is my first entry for Ludum Dare 49 and my second game I made with Love2d.

Music by: Bensound.com
